name: Reference The 11,000ers Of The Canadian Rockies 2nd Edition
categories: The 11,000ers Of The Canadian Rockies 2nd Edi
description: This updated climber’s guide and history of the 11,000-ft peaks in the Canadian Rockies captures the lively and frequently forgotten accounts of pioneering climbers. Each entry provides a vivid description of the peak, an extensive history of early ascents, and a detailed description of moderate to intermediate routes, including access and approach information. Includes contemporary and historical photos, area maps, updated routes and access information, and 4 new peaks for a total of 58.
